Audio.Locality: El Talisman, San Vicente, Yariguies, Santander
Audio.Author: Thomas Donegan
Audio.Comments: 50% ID certainty. Open to suggestions otherwise, but this appears likely to be a T mystacalis doing a mimic of Henicorhina leucophrys. The notes sound a bit too liquid and deep for H leucophrys to me but the pattern is almost identical to one of the prominent song sequences in H leucophrys at this site.
